channel.title: Some supa help o.o
channel.description: Well I'm trying to make a f2p pk zone. When people click the teleport I want the system to check their items and inventory to make sure they don't take any member items??

item.title: Some supa help o.o
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Thank you, Yes there is, Yet it would most likely take MORE room than the code above,
You would need to do something like,

Public void freeitems
itemID(“id”) || (“id”) || (“id”) || and you would need to keep doing that

I would just do
public void memitems
and list Members/donators items

Read full topic

item.title: Some supa help o.o
item.dc:creator: @range_2her range 2her
item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:2, topic:301980”]look for the Command that tele’s them In “client.java”
Under that it should say something like:
if(Command.Equals.IgnoreCase(“command”)) {
teletoX = ####;
teletoY = ####;
change it to:
if(Command.Equals.IgnoreCase(“command”) && player.HasItem(“members item ID”) || (“members item id”) || (“members item id”) And just keep going untill yer done with members items then:
sM(“You cannot take Members items into PK!”)
Else{
teletoX = ####;
teletoY = ####;

Something like that…[/quote]hmm, I like what you did there I will save this for another tele, this will take lots of room up. Is there a way you could make it so if you have ftp items you can teleport there?

Read full topic
